TopicTitle: Nuka Corp shuttle project ( and apparently other stuff :D )

Articles.Content: It seems like you "failure to launch" (IÃ‚Â´m sorry, I just had to!) has been addressed multiple times..so I will not mention it. Your designs, however, are great! I would like to see some of your larger projects come to fruition first..as I am a proponent of bigger is better when it comes to KSP Have fun! Wish you the best man.

I actually didn't really mind all the pictures and stuff. I Just had something to dream about So yea, please don't stop?

Well don't think is a good Idea. Will keep the current with only posting stuff when It is ready for beta testing.

I WANT THAT POD !!!

Really looks great !

Is the empty space around the hatch (or at least i think it's an hatch) the room for chute ?

Yes it is based on the Orion capsule that Nasa is currently making. Will also add decouple and asas unit for it. It is bigger in diameter than the bigger ones that is in the vanilla KSP. So it need custom decouple that will fit those.

If you keep on doing cool stuff like that you may end up as dev!

Rofl doubtful. Currently the only thing I can show of my models are 3d renders. Have not released any of them yet. So if they are looking for future employee. I will not be on the list. Just because of my lack of speed in making them. And think the current squad size is big enough to finish KSP.

It seems like you "failure to launch" (IÃ‚Â´m sorry, I just had to!) has been addressed multiple times..so I will not mention it. Your designs, however, are great! I would like to see some of your larger projects come to fruition first..as I am a proponent of bigger is better when it comes to KSP Have fun! Wish you the best man.

ROFLMAO yup that covers my work pretty realistically Thinking on finishing up the biggest shuttle on the list, after I finish Korion MK2.

Ah ok will tease you guys one last time

Took WAY to long for me to figure out how to make the hatch and the ladder on that pod but at least I finished it. Currently I'm finishing up the parachute and after that the decouple.
Dont say this has died, please say it aint so? :'(

Dont say this has died, please say it aint so? :'(

I hope it isn't either.

But he did say that he would not post any update unless he had something worth releasing. I can only hope that he hasn't been on because he's busy working on his projects.
This capsule looked like a one person vehicle at first because of the wonkie window. It looked like it was going to be where the kerbals head would be. haha
the new korion looks amasing i might have ideas for it just have to whate untill it reless
Man, there is so much stuff here that still isn't released

Loving those strap-on boosters! I always wanted a tiny set of SRBs!

Sorry but they are not SRBs. just ordinary liquid engine.

Have been away for a while. Was in no mood to do anything again. But back again. And a little emergency. Was trying out the now stuff in 0.16 and went for Mun. And finally found the arch. Though I accidently activated the decoupler and not the ladder. I have a new mission. To make a pod to get them back home.

little screenshot comp. if the mission

for me this looks like a creeper head

Well jeb want to do something cool I guess

And now they are stuck on Mun

Mission:

have a bigger pod to carry 6 kerbals. And not to big that it dos not fit the new parts. So far I think I have the design settled.

And the seating arrangement.

And yes had a brainfart. And made a little shuttle

The shuttle looks cute
want it now!
They look sweet , i specially like the shuttle
That was an old post from July, al8793 just messed up the quote
I want the mini shuttle!!!!!
Man, so mutch stuff, so mutch good!

you got some skills Mr.

am... can i have the kerbal model? plz? plz? plz? XD it would make things much esier on design

When are you going to release anything? I love your work, but the shuttle (the first one) looked about ready to add to the game before you just... did not add it. Any ETA?

Still, I love your modding skillz, dude.

When are you going to release anything? I love your work, but the shuttle (the first one) looked about ready to add to the game before you just... did not add it. Any ETA?

Still, I love your modding skillz, dude.

He vowed not to post anything until release, so no ETA, we will just have to be surprised one day!

Hey well the server crash did remove the new model I'm making it this time. This is just the render of the model that where before the wipe.

And a new Nmap for the cockpit.

Are planning to add specmap to it later.
